page.title: 17Village Shops in Northants
page.content: It is getting more difficult for village shops to survive against competition of the large supermarkets in the town.They usually stock a wide range of goods but the prices are inevitably higher than those in the supermarkets which can buy in bulk. {How do these small village shops survive,especially in the villages close to the town?} They are obviously more convenient, especially for those who find it difficult to travel to the town. These are usually the more elderly people or women with babies or young children. The village shop also offers a more personal service. The shopkeeper knows his customers & will have more time to talk to them. Many people prefer this to waiting in long queues in the supermarket.
